title: Vigee Le Brun--innovations in self portrait

content.question: Elisabeth Louise Vigée Le Brun’s Self-Portrait differs from earlier European portraiture traditions because Vigée Le Brun

choices.label: was among the first women to depict herself as an artist
used her self-portrait to convey coded political ideas
rejected the inclusion of religious references in her self portrait
depicted herself standing instead of seated as would be traditional for women

content.answer: was among the first women to depict herself as an artist
